title: Go On
resume: Ryan King, a recent  widower and sports talk radio host ready to get back to work after the  loss of his wife. Ryan's alpha-male boss, Stephen, has a different  plan in store for Ryan, making him attend grief counseling before  returning to the air. A reluctant Ryan finds himself in a support group  for "life change," where he meets an oddball cast of characters, all  with their own backstories filled with varying degrees of loss.
